text: Yakshcho dva hrupy viruyuchiv borolysʹ z odyn odnoho, vy budete posvyatyty yikh. Yakshcho odna hrupa aggresses proty inshi, vy budete borotysʹ aggressing hrupa do vony pidkoryayutʹsya do BOZHOYI komandy. Odnoho razu vony pidkoryayutʹsya, vy budete posvyatyty dvi hrupy equitably. Vy budete pidtrymaty spravedlyvistʹ; BOH lyubytʹ tsi khto tilʹky
